sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Customers() { // Sample customers data const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([ { id: 1, customer_code: 'CUST001', first_name: 'John', last_name: 'Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '123-456-7890', gender: 'Male', city: 'New York', total_purchases: 5, total_spent: 250.00, is_active: true }, { id: 2, customer_code: 'CUST002', first_name: 'Jane', last_name: 'Smith', email: 'jane.smith@example.com', phone: '987-654-3210', gender: 'Female', city: 'Los Angeles', total_purchases: 3, total_spent: 120.00, is_active: false } ]); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const [editingCustomer, setEditingCustomer] = useState(null); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ customer_code: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', phone: '', gender: '', city: '', total_purchases: 0, total_spent: 0, is_active: true }); const handleAddCustomer = () => { if (formData.customer_code && formData.first_name && formData.last_name && formData.email) { const newCustomer = { ...formData, id: Date.now(), total_purchases: Number(formData.total_purchases), total_spent: Number(formData.total_spent), is_active: Boolean(formData.is_active) }; setCustomers([...customers, newCustomer]); setFormData({ customer_code: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', phone: '', gender: '', city: '', total_purchases: 0, total_spent: 0, is_active: true }); setShowAddModal(false); } }; const handleEditCustomer = () => { if (editingCustomer && formData.customer_code && formData.first_name && formData.last_name && formData.email) { setCustomers(customers.map(cust => cust.id === editingCustomer.id ? { ...formData, id: cust.id, total_purchases: Number(formData.total_purchases), total_spent: Number(formData.total_spent), is_active: Boolean(formData.is_active) } : cust )); setEditingCustomer(null); setFormData({ customer_code: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', phone: '', gender: '', city: '', total_purchases: 0, total_spent: 0, is_active: true }); } }; const handleDeleteCustomer = (id) => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this customer?')) { setCustomers(customers.filter(cust => cust.id !== id)); } }; const openEditModal = (customer) => { setEditingCustomer(customer); setFormData({ ...customer }); }; const closeModal = () => { setShowAddModal(false); setEditingCustomer(null); setFormData({ customer_code: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', phone: '', gender: '', city: '', total_purchases: 0, total_spent: 0, is_active: true }); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Customers Management

Manage your customers and their information.

{/* Customers List - Table for sm+ */}
{customers.map((customer) => ( ))}
Code First Name Last Name Email Phone Gender City Purchases Spent Active Actions
{customer.customer_code} {customer.first_name} {customer.last_name} {customer.email} {customer.phone} {customer.gender} {customer.city} {customer.total_purchases} ${customer.total_spent.toFixed(2)} {customer.is_active ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
{/* Card layout for mobile */}
{customers.map((customer) => (
{customer.first_name} {customer.last_name}
Code: {customer.customer_code}
Email: {customer.email}
Phone: {customer.phone}
Gender: {customer.gender}
City: {customer.city}
Purchases: {customer.total_purchases}
Spent: ${customer.total_spent.toFixed(2)}
{customer.is_active ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
))}
{/* Add/Edit Modal */} {(showAddModal || editingCustomer) && (

{editingCustomer ? 'Edit Customer' : 'Add New Customer'}

setFormData({...formData, customer_code: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" placeholder="Enter customer code" />
setFormData({...formData, first_name: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" placeholder="Enter first name" />
setFormData({...formData, last_name: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" placeholder="Enter last name" />
setFormData({...formData, email: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" placeholder="Enter email" />
setFormData({...formData, phone: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" placeholder="Enter phone number" />
setFormData({...formData, city: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" placeholder="Enter city" />
setFormData({...formData, total_purchases: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" min="0" />
setFormData({...formData, total_spent: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" min="0" step="0.01" />
setFormData({...formData, is_active: e.target.checked})} className="h-4 w-4 text-purple-600 focus:ring-purple-500 border-gray-300 rounded" id="is_active" />
)}
); } export default Customers;
